name: Simple flight game
description:
Simple flight game

Simple flight game - game prototype made to  support play with mouse and keyboard.  Goal of  Making Prototype is  show  that flight  game can be usable with mouse and keyboard. Game uses simple as possible Lift and Drag calculations.  

How to fly:

  1. Center mouse on screen and Press C key. 
  2. Increase thrust to around 30 000 N using W key . 
  3. Wait until speed reach 30 m/s. 
  4. When pull mouse back.  
  5. Aircraft will take off ground.
  6. When aircraft is in air use Mouse X or Y axis to control  pitch and roll.

Controls:

Thrust: W/S keys

Yaw: Z/X keys

Center mouse axis : C key

Mouse Y Axis controls pitch.

Mouse X axis controls roll.
